body:
Other google properties have standardised on ? to display the help text.
That would be my suggestion.
On 22 Feb 2015 17:12, "Josh Bleecher Snyder" <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> My suggestions were intended to try to preserve the helpful behavior for
> newcomers without being in the way for folks like me. (And I wouldn't mind
> it if I was just browsing through talks. It's when I'm hitting refresh
> every other minute that it is bothersome.) I'm open to other suggestions.
> I'm pretty sure there's a way.
>
